name: Vladislava Zapryanova
what_you_do: Certima B.V. transforms the global food industry through innovative business strategies in food compliance and supply chain transparency.

who_you_serve: Businesses in the global food industry seeking compliance and supply chain transparency solutions.
offering: Food compliance consulting, supply chain transparency solutions, and strategic leadership in global food safety.
bio: Vladislava Zapryanova is the Founder and Managing Director of Certima B.V., driving innovation in global food compliance and supply chain transparency. She leads a team situated across six countries and is a participant in the BRCGS Delivery Partner network. She has held director positions in the Netherlands since 2015.
service_provided: Food compliance consulting, supply chain transparency, food safety strategy, recall management support
